metadata.dc:author: López Gil, F
Torné Escasany, R
Umbert Millet, P
metadata.dc:description: A 46-years-old man with non familial acrokeratosis verruciformis of Hopf is described. We comment on the clinical and histopathological features of this rare dermatosis and the unsuccessful therapy with etretinate.
metadata.dc:title: Acroqueratosis verruciforme de Hopf. Comunicación de un caso no familiar.
[Hopf's acrokeratosis verruciformis. Communication of a non-familial case].
